      • runSeparateKOAnalysis

        public static void runSeparateKOAnalysis(Population pop)
                                  throws java.io.IOException

        Parameters:

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        java.io.IOException

      • runGlobalMutationAnalysis

        public static void runGlobalMutationAnalysis(Population pop)
                                      throws java.io.IOException

        Parameters:
        pop -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • knockoutResistance

        public static double knockoutResistance(Population pop)
        get the percentage of knock-out resistance. example: if they resist at 3position on 6 --> resistance = 0.5
        Parameters:
        pop - population to test
        Returns:
        percentage of resistance

      • genePersistence

        public static java.lang.Integer[] genePersistence(Population pop)
        count the number of repeated genes in a specific population. We are working with 'interaction matrix' this is not a gene.
        Parameters:
        pop -
        Returns:
        count of all encountered genes
